column4: I have a question.  I just installed a fresh copy of Dapper.  I was wondering if it's possible to take a "copy" of the theme and settings that I have in 5.10 and copy them over to Dapper.
you may be able to get them out of any of the number of folders beginning with . in your home directory on breezy
I didn't say I had all the answers
but thats where those personal settings are stored
